content.备注: 此处爬取数据中的指定位置id,数量
content.list: function Main(html){var endid=strmiddle(jsoup(html,'select > option:last-child'),'第','頁');var obj= [];for(var i =1;i<endid;i++){ var num = i;var n=3;var a;function PrefixInteger(num, n) {a = (Array(n).join(0) + num).slice(-n);}obj.push(a);};return obj;}
